alert.note: Alert for Cecil (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 17 at 8:46AM EST until January 17 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in Cecil County. * WHEN...Until noon EST today, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...At 5.5 feet, minor shoreline flooding begins near Chesapeake City. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides up to 4 feet above normal. The next high tide at Chesapeake City is at 10:14 AM and 10:31 PM. The next high tide at Charlestown is at 9:46 AM and 10:42 PM. The next high tide at Port Deposit is at 9:18 AM and 10:14 PM. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. North East River at Charlestown MLLW Categories - Minor 4.5 ft, Moderate 6.0 ft, Major 7.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.7 ft, Moderate 3.2 ft, Major 4.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 17/10 AM 4.4 1.6 3.5 0 None 17/10 PM 3.5 0.7 1.6 0 None 18/10 AM 1.3 -1.5 0.4 0 None 18/11 PM 2.5 -0.3 0.6 0 None 19/11 AM 2.2 -0.6 1.2 0 None 20/12 AM 2.9 0.1 1.0 0 None Chesapeake and Delaware Canal at Chesapeake City MLLW Categories - Minor 5.5 ft, Moderate 6.5 ft, Major 7.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 2.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 17/10 AM 5.8 2.6 3.6 0 Minor 17/11 PM 3.6 0.4 1.0 0 None 18/11 AM 2.5 -0.7 0.3 0 None 18/11 PM 3.1 -0.1 0.5 0 None 19/11 AM 3.4 0.2 1.1 0 None 20/12 AM 3.4 0.2 0.9 0 None Susquehanna River at Port Deposit MLLW Categories - Minor 6.0 ft, Moderate 9.0 ft, Major 10.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 3.6 ft, Moderate 6.6 ft, Major 7.6 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 17/08 AM 4.9 2.5 4.3 0 None 17/09 PM 3.6 1.2 2.0 0 None 18/11 AM 1.4 -1.0 0.6 0 None 18/11 PM 2.5 0.1 0.8 0 None 19/11 AM 2.3 -0.1 1.4 0 None 19/11 PM 3.0 0.6 1.3 0 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
